No this movie isn't the most spectacular. But lets face it, not all "Transformer" movies are the only ones we like to watch. This particular movie was most excellent. I wasn't expecting much what with all the self proclaimed critics. However, I found this to one of Tarantinos best. Maybe everyone was expecting another "Transformers" like movie?
I'm actually not a huge Tarantino fan. But for some reason he can make a movie, from time to time, that really grabs me and takes me in with it.

Video was better than I expected it to be.
